title: Lesson Study (LS) Workshop for Mathematics Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational theory knowledge and mathematics education experience
context.additional_context: Collaborative Teacher Learning and Professional Development Program for Pre-Service Mathematics Teachers and Education Students via Lesson Study (LS)

learning_goals: Learners can apply the step-by-step process of Lesson Study (LS)—planning, implementation, observation, and reflection—to real-world cases.
Learners can design math instruction improvement plans through collaborative problem-solving with peer teachers.
Learners can analyze class data collected via LS activities to derive strategies for enhancing student comprehension.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
